definition: variant of 喘吁吁[chuan3 xu1 xu1]

sentences.english: When Rodger finally felt his feet touch bottom, he was gasping.
sentences.chinese: 當羅傑的腳終於觸碰到水底時，他已氣喘噓噓了。

sentences.english: He dashed into my room, hatless, barefooted and out of breath.
sentences.chinese: 他光頭赤腳，氣喘噓噓地衝進我的房間來。

sentences.english: My heavy luggage almost got me out of breath.
sentences.chinese: 沉甸甸的行李，搞得我氣喘噓噓。
